title: SOCWELL LLC pattern roller for clay, Ancient Greek 25 BC, 2 inch(50mm) x 3/4" diameter size, made in USA of fine maple wood (SD2257)

for marking soft clay, works best with water based clays
description: These maple wood hand rollers are made for marking soft clay with a surface pattern. No handle is needed with these rollers. Just roll them like a rolling pin over the clay surface, can be used flat on a clay slab or on the wall of a piece while still on the wheel. Made in Wisconsin, USA.
